Description: Small fragment from the body of a red/grey pottery vessel, interior very worn, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Curator's comments: Part of 1922,1014.118 Part of 1922,1014.151 Part of 1922,1014.152 Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 1
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393172) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393172)
